name: Tax Strategy Comparison
description: Compare different tax optimization strategies for equity compensation
notes: This portfolio compares five core tax strategies:
2. Exercise All Vested - immediate exercise to start LTCG clock
3. Tender and Donate - balanced liquidity and charity approach
4. Personalized Comprehensive - conservative exercise amounts, early sales for house fund
5. Personalized Strategy - optimized exercise timing, better option expiration management
Both personalized strategies focus on AMT credit consumption, 3-year donation windows, and house funding with no opportunity loss.
